1.content:
The school bell has finally rung, signalling the end of the day for all the girls attending St. Adelaide's K-12 Academy. In short notice the many students began packing their things and bid a warm farewell to their teachers, merrily moving along as they passed through the illustrious gates of the institution. On their way out many of them passed by you—an average run-of-the-mill janitor—smiling wide with goodbyes and farewells as you did the same. They were the pride and joy of St. Adelaide's K-12 Academy—all of them bright students with bright futures ahead of them, and you couldn't be more proud of them as were all the staff members. Speaking of which, one of the security guards came up to you, having just gotten back from her break.
         "Heya," she greeted you, mouth stuffed with powdered, jelly-filled doughnut. "Keepin' an eye on our girls eh?" You nodded, just making sure that the girls made it across the street safely and met up with their friends and parents on their way home. "Still can't believe the year's just barely started, but hey, that just means we all got a year full of good times ahead of us to look forward to." True that, and with all the wonderful students you had the chance of getting to know, you knew it was going to be a year to remember. "Anyways, I came here to grab you for a bit. The principle's got somethin'…heavy she's gotta tell ya'. She wants you to meet her and the others in the teacher's lounge." Confused, you asked her what she meant by that. "Well, it's pretty serious, involves you, and needs to be discussed like right away. Don't worry about the girls, I'll keep my eyes out for 'em." Thanking her for the message and for keeping lookout, you squeezed through some of the students coming out of the gates and made your way to the principle's office, exchanging kind words and smiles all the way there. Eventually, you came upon the teacher's lounge and found all of the other staff members inside having patiently waited for your arrival.
         "Ah, there you are," the principle greeted you. "Please, take a seat." While everyone greeted you as well and there was no hint of malice or scorn, something about the atmosphere felt incredibly tense. Once you were seated, the principle cleared her throat out and began to speak. "Now, I'm just going to get this out of the way right now; you are being accused of stalking our students and harboring lecherous intentions towards them." This shocked you; after the orientation you went through someone was going around accusing you of perving on the girls! Remaining quiet and not wanting to make yourself look bad, you urged the principle to go on. "Eyewitnesses are claiming that a suspicious hooded figure had been seen loitering near the girls' restrooms during recess periods in an apparent attempt to eavesdrop and spy on the girls and women who went in and out of these restrooms." You knew right off the bat that that wasn't true; you had actually never set foot near the restrooms while school was in session, and you wondered who could be coming up with such slander. "We have asked the eyewitnesses to come forward to meet you in person to verify this, yet they have declined. I have spoken with the police with the matter and found that the eyewitnesses had provided them video footage. I had to fight with them long and hard to get a copy of it because they claimed that 'it would endanger the eyewitnesses' or some such rubbish and they would not give me their names, so here we are. I had to have you here so you could see it for yourself." The principle pulled her phone out and pulled up the video evidence of you suspiciously hanging around the bathroom, except it clearly wasn't you hanging around the restroom. In fact, the restrooms didn't even look like the same ones in the school at all, and upon close inspection you could see a little boy or two passing by the area. Immediately you knew something fishy was up.
         "My thoughts exactly. This footage clearly could not have come from our school because we have no other male members here but you, student or otherwise. The issue, of course, is that with information like this spreading quite quickly many people are assuming the worst already. Worry not, we have our own footage to prove this forgery wrong, though given the general community's stance on you I doubt that hard unaltered evidence will get them to change tunes overnight, and I suspect that the local police is on this conspiracy as well."
         "Those police officers never do shit for this school anyways," the P.E. teacher remarked. "They're always either stirring shit up about this stupid witchcraft mess or whatever they can come up with these days, and now that we finally have a good man in our school for the first time instead of those asshats they wanna jump on this case like a fatass on cake."
         "I just can't understand why they won't just leave us all alone…" The music teacher said. "What have we ever really done to them?"
         "This school has been an all-girls school for centuries since its founding to give the poor girls in the area a chance to learn and grow, and it wasn't an easy fight with all of them being accused of being witches," the principle said. "Most of the men in this area cannot seem to accept a woman growing beyond being a stay-at-home babymaker who fetches them whatever food they desire and sleeps with them whenever they wish." You recall the principle mentioning that during your orientation, and looking back on it you were very lucky to even get the job considering how unlikely everyone thought that you would get it. You proved them wrong of course and earned their grateful respect. "Since girls can learn to be whatever they wish at this school beyond that, quite the number of men have been opposed to this institution and the mostly male-dominated police force are among them. Still, we'll just have to fight this case and hope that we can pull this off. That is all I wanted to discuss with you, so you are free for the rest of the day. Get safe home and have a good rest of the evening." You gave the principle and the other teachers inside a respectful nod and left them in the teacher's lounge. Things were not looking too good for you given that the police seemed to already have their handcuffs waiting for you by the sound of it, and with how the other men disliked you it was obvious that some other man had tried to set you up. Why that was you didn't know, but you weren't about to let them ruin your life like this. Before you could leave through the gates, one of the other security guards came up to you in a hurry.
         "Excuse me, wait up a moment!" She stopped before you all in a huff. "Sorry for bothering you, but I need you to get to one of the restrooms near the back of the school really quick. My stomach had been killing me all day and the girls were all using the restrooms up in the front so I, well, I might have left a bit of a mess here and there…" You gave the woman a roll of the eyes though with a chuckle and smirk, remembering how you warned her about the spicy foods she was gorging herself on. "Hey those were damn good buffalo wings I'll have you know—totally worth the near diarrhea accident. But anyways, I'm sorry about the mess and I promise that I won't be so careless next time. Can you do me this solid before the principle tans my hide for this?" Laughing, you told her that you had it under control and that you'd find something to tell the principle if she ever caught wind of it. "Oh, thanks man, I owe you one. Anyways, I better hurry on home; my husband gets a bit…finicky when I'm not there before he gets back. See ya!" You waved the security guard goodbye and made your way towards the back of the school to find this restroom the woman sullied. You stopped by your office on the way there to get whatever tools you might needed; you never knew how much of a mess could have been left behind. With everything you needed, you resumed your trip to the restrooms and got there in no time at all; while the institution was a large, university-like place you knew your way around it like the back of your hand. Eventually you made it to your destination and found the restrooms in the back; they were never used according to the other staff, at least until today, and they certainly looked abandoned like they were haunted. In any case, you opened the restroom door and expected to see a puddle of shit all over the floor, but you instead found the last thing you would have expected: someone was still in the restroom…
         "Mmmph…!" Standing—or rather squatting before you was a small girl who looked to be no older than 10, and her back was turned to you while her backside was exposed to the air. Evidently she was having trouble pushing out the turd hanging out from her tailpipe and was so engrossed in this that she didn't notice you come in, at least not at first. Surprised from the sight, you made no sound, not even as the girl suddenly stopped straining and looked up to turn her head toward you. Shining eyes full of innocent intrigue and with nary a hint of embarrassment or shame met yours, and soon a wide smile graced her lips.
         "Oh, hello there mister! What's your name?" You knew right then and there that meeting this strange girl was going to change your life forever…

This young maiden of fair complexion, eyes crisp like the ocean and golden hair like the sun and dressed in all her finery like medieval royalty, stared deep into you with the purity of a true princess if there ever was one, all while she continued to squat as though she were common born—still with that sizeable turd hanging from her. If this were a dream it was certainly the most surreal, and yet here she stood before you, and cold reality came upon you once again as you struggled to get out words to say to her.
         "Heehee, you're silly mister!" she laughed. "Won't you tell me your name? Pretty please?" Reason finally returning to you, you awkwardly asked the young girl what she was still doing in the restroom while averting your eyes from her form. "You're so funny, I asked you first~!" How the child could remain so optimistic for her age was beyond you, but it was clear that you were getting nowhere asking your questions without having answered hers. You started off with your name and told her what it was you were doing at the moment, and again she laughed that childish melody. "Aw, you're in the wrong potty mister! The stinky potty is right over there." She pointed past you to the door on the other side of the restroom you were in. All flush-faced with embarrassment now, you thanked the young girl and was about to beat a hasty retreat.
         "Aw, you're leaving?" the girl said with sadness. "But I haven't finished pooping yet. Won't you stay with me so I can finish?" You stopped dead in your tracks upon hearing that, and wondered why such a young girl would ask something like that. Surely she knew of how much trouble you would get if you were seen with her like this. You tried explaining this to her and that you had another job to do, and again she simply laughed at your apparent ignorance. That lady who had to poop real bad left it dirty but it's all clean, so you can stay with me now!" This was complete nonsense the girl was saying, and while trying to be as nice as possible you bid the girl a short farewell to clean the other restroom. Ignoring her whining, you quietly closed the door and made your way to the other bathroom. With your cleaning tools you were set to work, but once you entered the restroom you found it to be completely spick-and-span; not a trace of grime or dirt or pollutants to be found anywhere, and inside you found a note from the security guard from earlier, apologizing for leaving the now nonexistent mess behind. How she had paper to write with considering her situation was beyond you, and even more was that the bathroom was completely clean like the little girl had said. Perhaps someone had come by before you did and cleaned it for you? In any scenario, it was clean and there was no more reason for you to linger. Leaving somewhat disappointed at the lack of work, you left the restroom behind and considered heading home, but then you'd be leaving the girl in the bathroom behind, and that was irresponsible no matter how you looked at it. Reluctantly, you knocked on the door, calling out for the girl to see if she was almost finished. There was no sound on the other side, and you thought that maybe the girl had already left; given how talkative she was when you were there she would have responded by now. Seized by some unknown temptation, you opened the door and chanced one last look, and for the second time that day you were left in shock.
         The girl from before had not left; in fact she seemed to still be struggling with her turd from earlier before it finally broke free from her behind into the toilet below with a ripe fart. You could only stare aghast as she sighed in relief.
         "All done!" she cheered to no one perhaps. Slowly she stood while pointing her somehow spotless behind to you, dragging her bloomers up to her hips and letting her dress fall down to her ankles. When she turned around she laid eyes upon you once more and broke into a bright smile. "Yay, you came back mister!" Something was clearly not right with this child and you wondered how she happened upon the school, but you put that thought to the back of your mind and asked the child who she was.
         "I am Princess Aimée Rosé Europa! Isn't my name pretty mister?" It was certainly a pretty name but that wasn't really what you were after. You asked after the child's parents and how worried sick they must be about her, and in an instant the girl's smile fell, replaced with a sullen frown. "My mommy's gone to…sleep with the flowers, and my daddy doesn't like me… I don't want to go home…" That alone was disturbing for a child to know acutely of the death of one's own parent, and her household already wasn't shaping up to be a happy one from what you heard. Still, you had a moral obligation to return the girl to her surviving parent for her own good, at least for the time being. "Ooh, I know! You can be my new daddy!" That certainly threw you for a loop; the girl had already bore no shame relieving herself before you, and now she was asking you to be her new father? Assuming that her real father wouldn't try to kill you, how were you to suddenly explain your new "daughter" to everyone? Besides being a bachelor you were also a virgin so virtually no one would believe that she was your daughter anyhow. You did your best to dissuade her and tell her she needed to go back to her actual father, and that if something happened to her that you'd call the authorities right away (before realizing that they'd likely do jack shit about it). Maybe one of the staff members could take her in, but the girl then decided to pout over the matter.
         "No, no, no! That won't do! You MUST be my new daddy!" Her stubbornness was expected though you were going to put your foot down until the girl tried pulling off the persuasion card.
         "If you promise to be my new daddy then I'll go to school and be a good little angel! I'll get good grades and make my new daddy proud, then when I get bigger I'll be super rich so I can take care of my new daddy!" It was true that you didn't have much in the way of finances but you weren't about to use this girl for that, but before you could refuse her with finality she had one last trick up her sleeves—or rather her dress.
         "My daddy would let his dirty friends come over and try to tickle me in weird places until I peed myself!" Aimée said this as she lifted her dress up, not enough to show off too much of her braless bust but more than enough for her bloomers to be on full display, not to mention bruises and a welt or two here and there. "Daddy and his mean friends drank stinky juice and spilled it all over my pretty dress, and their breaths smelled like car poot, and he wants me to be his perfect princess when he does mean things to me! He hurt mommy and she went to go sleep with the flowers forever! I hate daddy!!" Hearing the girl pour all of that out on the verge of a tear-filled tantrum sure made you throw out any sort of reservation you had against her staying with anyone but her father. Feeling terribly sorry for the girl, you knelt down to comfort her saying that she'd never have to go back to that man if you had anything to say about it. Sniffling back tears, Aimée asked if you would be her new daddy, and while you resisted the waterworks for a spell the softy in you eventually gave in and said yes; you'd be her new father if it made her happy. Aimée looked up at you with surprised eyes and ran to hug you as tightly as she could.
         "Ooh, thank you so much new daddy! I promise I'll be a good girl and make you and mommy proud!" You were glad that the girl was starting to lighten up again though the matter of eventually relocating all of her stuff would be a hassle, especially if the girl's father was the stay-at-home type, but things would get done and soon enough the man himself would be put behind bars once they gathered enough evidence against him. For now, getting her to a safe place away from him was your priority for the time being.
         "Can we go home to our house daddy?" Aimée asked, and while you were on board with her being anywhere not at her old home, you still weren't sure if taking her straight to your house was a good idea, especially amidst the case going against you of being a perving creep. Maybe asking one of your coworkers was a better idea, but Aimée seemed to read your mind and refused against it. "Daddy's not thinking of leaving me in a stranger's house is he? I want to go home with daddy and spend the night with him!" 111.content:
The girl seemed eager to see your home and again the softy in you couldn't resist letting her have her way for now. She seems to have been through a lot and you wanted to indulge her, so you agreed to take her to your home.
         "Yay! I'm going to my new home with daddy!" Aimée squealed. Petting her on the head, you took her by her hand and led her out the restroom. By now the sky had darkened with the sun nearly vanished from the horizon, and holding on tight to Aimée's hand you made sure she didn't stray far. You hadn't run into any of your coworkers, which you suppose was good for you, but was eerie how no one seemed to be out and about even with how late it was getting. This meant that there would be no one around to disturb you on your way home and that left Aimée with plenty of time to ask you question after question. It was typically girly subjects like dolls, dresses, and candies (you discovered that she could be placated easily with candy—hard candies of the fancy kinds in particular—through these talks) before she suddenly swerved into personal topics about you, including poking her nose into your love life (or lack of it thereof) and wondering if you lived with anyone (to which you answered that you were on your own for quite some time).
         Eventually, you made it to your house, and Aimée couldn't be any more excited; you'd never seen anyone so excited to enter your house—not that you had any real visitors in a long time. After stepping foot in your house for the first time since you had left it, you took a small stretch and hung your clothes on a nearby rack. Aimée had taken to run around in your house in unadulterated excitement, and you hoped that she didn't break anything while she was staying with you.
         "Hey daddy, who's this?" Aimée asked you, bringing you a portrait. Looking at it, you knew that it was the picture you had taken back in high school of you and your then-girlfriend. You both looked so happy in the photo, but it was not meant to be and the two of you broke up on bitter terms over trivial things. You were more than okay to get back together with her, but by then she insisted on burning the bridge between you both and you had not seen her or her new boyfriend since. Snapping back to reality, as awkward as it was to explain this all to a child, you went ahead and told her that the lady was your ex-girlfriend. You didn't feel comfortable telling Aimée why you had broken up, but you did tell her that the love between you two was gone and she left with another guy.
         "So…you broke up just like mommy and my old man?" If this child wasn't just the master of raising more questions about her household…but you figured you'd learn more about that later. You told Aimée that you had been living on your own since then after your father kicked you out for it. "Aw, your own daddy kicked you out the house…well don't worry, you have me now; I'll take care of you!" You questioned how a ten-year-old kid could really "take care of you", but you appreciated the sentiment behind it and patted the kid on her head. Just then your stomach growled, reminding you that you hadn't eaten anything since you left the house this morning, and after a bit of teasing from Aimée you made for the kitchen to fix you both a small dinner. Mashed potatoes and vegetables weren't really your thing but you couldn't be too picky being a bit light on grocery money, though Aimée seemed to really enjoy it despite it being leftovers.
         "Yum! I never ate food this tasty!" And the string of questions you had continued, but it would've been rude to spoil the girl's happy mood and you just smiled at her as you ate your own fill. Eventually you both had finished your plates, with Aimée thanking you for the meal; you told her to think nothing of it and went to washing your plates, at least until Aimée interrupted you. "Wait! Lemme help, I can wash dishes super good! Watch!" Then at a speed you didn't think possible for a little kid, Aimée soaped up and scrubbed the dishes for you. Surprised, you could only stare as Aimée washed the plates like she was some expert maid before gently setting them out to dry. "Ta-da, all clean!" Aimée noticed the dumbstuck look you had on your face and giggled. "My old man used to make me wash dishes all the time, especially with mommy gone… I hated washing his dirty dishes but whenever you need me to wash dishes I'll get it done super quick!" At least that was one mystery solved, giving you just a little more insight into Aimée's family life. Still, you thanked the girl for a job well done and she smiled wide, happy that she was being complimented.
         "So, do I get a candy for cleaning the dishes? Mommy used to always give me one whenever I did my chores." Now that was something you didn't think you could do for her; you had literally no reason to keep candy in your house until Aimée had arrived, so it was very awkward for you to tell her that you didn't have any candy in your house. "Aw… Oh well, maybe next time?" She sounded hopeful at that prospect, and while you didn't want to let her down you didn't know if you really had the kind of money to buy the candies that she loved. You just told her that when you had enough money then you'd consider it, and she seemed satisfied enough. Yawning, you were about ready to hit the hay, and then you remembered that there was only one bed (a one person bed at that) in the house. It had been a while since you did the laundry (to get that funny smell out of your sheets), and given what Aimée had been through you didn't want her sleeping in such a bed. That left the two of you with only the couch, and it wasn't exactly comfortable.
         "What's wrong daddy? Are you upset?" Aimée asked. You weren't really upset, but you were bothered by how unsuitable your place really was for the girl. Maybe it was better off for her to stay at one of your coworkers', but it was too late for that right now. You told Aimée that since the bed was dirty that you two would be sleeping on the couch, and you expected Aimée to be disappointed by that; she was, but only a little bit. "That's okay! Me and mommy slept on the couch sometimes whenever my old man didn't want us sleeping with him; we always heard funny noises like other ladies were sleeping with him so mommy was okay with sleeping on the couch with me." Choosing not to be bothered by that admission, instead rather awkward with sharing a sleeping space with a young girl after you already seen her privates, you asked Aimée one last time if she was really okay with sleeping on the couch with you. "Yup! I know my daddy would never hurt me." True, though you were somewhat put off by how comfortable she already was with a total stranger. You figured that you'd have to get used to it and gave up fighting it. You told Aimée to stay put while you went to go get some cleaner blankets, and with them in tow you carelessly tossed all but your briefs onto the floor before laying on the couch. For the third time that day Aimée threw you in for a complete loop by doing the same thing—discarding everything but her bloomers and all but hoping right onto your stomach, knocking the wind out of your sails.
         "Sorry!" she apologized. You were quick to forgive her, and doing your best to ignore the almost completely naked girl on your body you pulled the blanket over the two of you and bid the girl goodnight. "Wait! Aren't you going to give me a goodnight kiss? Mommy would always give me a kiss on my forehead before we went to sleep." Resisting the urge to chuckle (which helped stifle the oncoming stiffy), you gave the girl a quick peck on her forehead and then said "goodnight" to her while she did the same, snuggling up against you before drifting off to sleep.
         After some time when you were sure she was sleep you went over everything that had gone on that day in your head, trying to make some sort of goddamned sense of it all; not even a week had passed since you started your new job at this school and already your life was drastically changing, from the accusations of stalking girls at the school flying left and right, and capped off with Aimée suddenly coming into your life insisting that you be her new daddy to get away from her apparent shit heel of a father—and all that besides the fact that you saw her intimates at least thrice that day. This all sounded like it came straight out of some fantasy work, and you weren't sure if you could take much more shocking swerves at this rate. You hoped that things would just calm down and settle into a somewhat normal routine for you and Aimée if she was to keep living with you. Still, you suppose that worse things could have happened, and it sounded like Aimée really needed a supportive adult figure in her life which you were more than happy to provide for her. It wasn't all that bad, and in a way being needed like this made you feel like you were still worth something. Smiling at that thought, you finally allowed yourself some peace of mind, and before you knew it you too had finally drifted off to sleep, looking forward to the days that would follow…

1111.content:
Morning had come for you at last, and yawning yourself awake you found yourself surprisingly refreshed considering how uncomfortable the couch was. In fact, the couch itself was far more comfortable than you last remembered it; maybe it had to do with spending the night with sweet little Aimée? Regardless you were waking up to a pleasant morning, and not too soon Aimée began stirring as well. When she awoke, the first thing she saw was your smiling face, and in turn she smiled as well.
         '"Good morning daddy…" Aimée greeted. You greeted her in kind ruffling her curly hair, asking her how she slept. "I slept like a baby! I had the best dream ever!" Happy for her and a tad curious, you asked what it was about. "Me and you and mommy all went to a theme park! It had knights, kings, queens, dragons, everything! We all ate delicious food and got on the rides and—and—" It was amusing to watch her gush about the theme park and the good times you had with her and her mother, and seeing her so happy you knew that you wanted to see that side of her again in the future. Maybe you could adopt her as your own kid, but then you'd have to go through her father, and God knows you aren't fit enough to get into a fight with anyone. That all would come later though, and right now you wanted to focus on taking care of this girl and doing your job at school. Speaking of which, you wondered just how educated the girl was, and if she wasn't already enrolled you'd have to get her in the system sooner or later. When Aimée calmed down enough, you asked her if she ever went to school.
         "No…" she said, turning sad. "Mommy taught me at home, but when she was gone my old man didn't want me studying, saying that a good housewife needed to learn how to care care of grown-ups properly." It was as you had expected—a home-schooled child in dire need of further education. Then, however, you questioned how she got into the school without anyone apparently noticing her, and voiced your concerns about this to her. "Oh, I just walked in and got lost. Also, watching so many other girls was super scary, so I ran to the pottyhouses in the back and stayed there until everyone left!" Ah, so that explained why you found her in the restrooms yesterday. You had assumed that she was already a student and had folks back home waiting for her, but now you know the truth of it all; you had to take care of her and make sure she got ahead in life since it was clear her father had no interest in that. Smiling, you told Aimée that you'd enroll her in school so she could make some friends and learn a lot about the world, though she seemed a little hesitant.
         "Really? But, there are so many other girls in the school! What if they don't want to be my friend?" You patted her on the head and assured her that there would always be one person who would love to be her friend, maybe even her best friend. Hearing that made the girl smile. "Thanks daddy! I promise to do my best!" Strange how fatherly you were towards Aimée already but you figured it to be natural. Anyways, you were in need of a morning shower and some breakfast, so you had Aimée (gently) hop off of you so you could get ready for the day, and again you were met with the sight of her standing in only her bloomers. You quickly averted your gaze from her and asked her to stay put for a few minutes while you took a shower.
         Once you were in the privacy of your bathroom you chastised yourself for letting your eyes linger on Aimée's bare body for so long; you couldn't act that way or have any sort of impure thoughts about her, not after what she had been through. So, you decided that a cold shower for starters would help keep that side of you down. After disrobing yourself you turned the shower head on and stepped in, surprised to find the water at a perfectly warm temperature, despite the hot water being out for the bath yesterday (which was why you skipped a bath last night). Oh well, you thought; the water was perfect and any thoughts about having a cold shower were gone by then. It only lasted for so long until you heard your toilet flush and your warm shower water turned to ice in an instant. Yelping, you knew who the culprit was and was about ready to chew the prankster out. Peeking your head out from behind the shower curtains, you saw Aimée completely dressed, save for the bloomers now at her ankles, as she sat on the toilet staring at you in surprise.
         "What's wrong daddy? Are you okay?" For a moment you were silenced by the sight of the girl on the toilet, but then you remembered having told her to stay in the living room and asked why she was in the bathroom. "I'm really sorry daddy, but I had to poop super bad!" You could forgive her for that, and with that you awkwardly went back to your shower. Throughout the whole time you were showering you could hear Aimée's grunts and sighs as she vacated herself into the toilet, and you couldn't help thinking back to the first time you caught her with her pants down. Her butthole was completely spotless despite emptying herself into the toilet and—wait a second, she didn't wipe herself after that. She had just pulled her bloomers up and that was that. Was she not taught to wipe herself either? Curious, you had to ask her to make sure she wiped her butt clean before pulling her underwear up.
         "But, my butt's never dirty," she replied. Even if that was true, you made sure that she knew to always wipe herself in front of other people—in the girl's bathroom of course. "Alright daddy." Glad that you got through to her on that front you went back to showering before she interrupted you again. "Daddy, can you help wash me?" You froze when she asked you that. "Mommy always used to help wash my back, but my old man never helped me clean myself. He always said I smelled strong like perfume and told me to stop bathing until I smelled really stinky…" Even after hearing that you weren't sure if it was a good idea to let her into the shower with you lest your erection creep up again, and that would make things even more awkward between you two. Eventually though, you relented and agreed to help her wash her back at least. "Yay, thank you so much!" The very instant she was in the shower with you, stripped all the way down, and then she hugged your wet self. She already had one of your clean towels in her hand and went for the soap, lathering her towel before she went to work on herself. Taken aback by this display, you just took your own towel and went to work on her back in silence as she hummed to herself. Doing your best to ignore her butt and the pleased sighing from Aimée, you soon took notice of what looked like a pair of wings tattooed to each shoulder plate. Curious (and fearing the worst) you calmly asked Aimée why she had a pair of wings tattooed to her back.
         "Hm? Oh, um, I asked mommy if I could get some pretty wings drawn on my back, and she had one of her friends come over and draw wings on me." You asked when she got the tattoo and Aimée suddenly seemed even more confused than at first. "Well… I think I got them when I was…um…I forgot how old I was when I got them… But they didn't hurt a bit! Mommy's friend was super skilled and I didn't feel a thing!" Aimée had to have been lying a little bit, at least about the not hurting part. Her skin looked so delicate that it should have been unbearable for her, and given her surprise when you brought the topic up she clearly wasn't expecting you to take notice of them. They were beautifully drawn wings if not incredibly intricately designed, but she seemed uncomfortable talking about the subject so you simply let it be and went back to washing her back. In time you finished her back at the same time she finished everything else.
         "All done!" she announced. Thank you so much for helping me daddy!" She hugged you and you lightly flinched from the contact of her naked body against your own, throwing out a stuttering "you're welcome" before she let go of you and left you be to dry herself off. She then shouted that she'll wait at the dinner table for breakfast before finally leaving you alone. What you wouldn't give to know what went on in that child's mind sometimes…
         After you handled the rest of your hygienic needs in the bathroom, you went down to make breakfast only to find that Aimée had already made you and herself a full plate of pancakes, eggs, bacon, and toast with orange juice. Astonished at how quickly she had made breakfast you asked if she already had some of the food sitting out when you went to the bathroom. She answered yes, saying that her mother had taught her a lot about cooking, and went to wolfing down her food. You likewise ate your food in silence, taking in everything she had told you. After that you had gotten yourself completely dressed and ready for work, taking Aimée by her hand and making your way toward the school. Soon you made it through the gates and made your way to the registration office, already preparing yourself for the awkwardness that was going to transpire. Inside, you saw the principal handling her paperwork from behind the registration desk; she looked up from her desk to find you in front of her and she gave a barely noticeable smile.
"Good morning," she greeted. "Is there something you needed to speak to me about?" Straight to business as always she was; you told her that you wanted to introduce her to someone you wanted to enroll. "A friend's child perhaps? Very well, where is…she…?" She took pause when she noticed Aimée holding your hand, who gave her what you assumed was a normal smile, though there was a mysterious feel to it.
         "Hi Miss Principal!" Aimée greeted, though the principal didn't immediately respond.
         "Oh, er, hello there, little lady. Might I ask, sir, what your relation to this child is…?"
1111.title: In The Morning, Take Aimée To School With You

choices: Tell The Bullies To Leave Li and Aimée Alone (Reserved)
11111.content:
Fearing the worst, you quickly told the principal that you were the girl's uncle; you lied saying that your brother (who you distinctly mentioned as having had a high school vasectomy before) came to you the previous night and begged you to take care of his daughter for him, with him claiming that he didn't have the money to keep taking care of her.
         "Uh huh…" Aimée said sadly. "We were about to lose our home until daddy said I can live with my uncle. My uncle is now acting like my substitute daddy until my real daddy can make more money and I can go back home with him and mommy!" You found yourself staring at Aimée in shock; she turned out to be a very good liar from what little she just said to the principal, and that made you wonder about what else she was hiding from even you given her reaction to you finding her tattoo. You met the principal's eyes, and she looked between the two of you with a questioning eyebrow. Out of the corner of your eye you thought you caught Aimée silently pleading with the principal before she snapped back to normal.
         "Oh, right, of course. You did mention that your brother had a daughter before." You said the opposite before today, though you were still grateful that the principal was playing along for whatever reason. "So, you wish to enroll your darling niece into our school?" You confirmed that that was the idea. "Well, classes have already started, but it is still the first week so I am certain that we can find a spot for her. I believe that the teachers will do their best to accommodate our new student here, and in no time she can fit in with the rest of the classes just fine." You thanked the principal for her generosity and prepared to sign some documents here and there, and with that Aimée was now officially enrolled into St. Adelaide's K-12 Academy. "There. Now, if you would, I would like to take this time to guide your niece around the school grounds. I doubt that we will have any more last-minute children wishing to join our school. In the meantime, you may get started on your work for today." You graciously bowed and bid the principal a well rest of the day as she escorted Aimée out of the registration office, and with that you were officially off to do some work.
         The day was uneventful for the most part, besides the occasional student greeting you, and there was honestly not much to clean up after considering how most of the girls were neat and tidy. Out of boredom, you grabbed some lunch and opted to visit the students during recess, mostly wanting to spend a smidge of time with your Aimée. Out in the playgrounds for the K-8th graders, you could find the girls running around doing just about everything from messing around with makeup to making sandcastles and even football (gridiron football it was called from what you heard), though Aimée was just about nowhere in sight. After some time of scanning after her, you instead found a young girl sitting at a table all by herself despite all the commotion going on around her. She looked to be the same age as Aimée but with jet black hair in a bun toward the back, and her features were softer but with deceptively sharper looking brown eyes. She also dressed in what you knew was formal Eastern Asian attire (you didn't know if it was Chinese, Japanese, or what), but what caught your attention most was that she looked sad—lonely even. Curious as to why she was sitting all by herself, you made your way past the various other students and called out to her. Surprised, she looked up at you not knowing what to say, but you simply smiled and took a seat next to her, asking if she wanted to eat lunch with you. Much like you assumed she would, she looked away all flushed.
         "U-Um, I-I guess I can eat lunch with you…" You thanked the girl before opening up your lunchcase, showing her some of the things you grabbed from the cafeteria. Not wanting to go too far with her you mostly ate in silence, making a remark or two about how good the food was every once in a while to yourself. You were about to eat the last chicken strip before the girl began speaking up.
         "Um, s-sir?" You gave her your attention, putting your food down. "M-Maybe it's best if you…sit with the other girls…" Having fully expected that perhaps you would end up bothering the girl, you apologized for troubling her and made your way off the table to find another sitting spot.
         "Oh, n-no, you're not bothering me. It's just…I-I don't think I'm good at making friends. Some of the other girls tease me for looking like a funny-looking princess, and other girls usually just avoid me… I don't want them to start making fun of you for sitting with me…" That was ridiculous, you thought, and whether or not some other students would make fun of you it didn't matter. You told the girl that you didn't care who said what and that you sat wherever you wanted. If no one wanted to be this girl's friend then maybe you could be her friend.
         "R-Really?" the girl asked, shocked that someone was asking if they could be friends with her. "B-But, you're a grown-up, and my mother doesn't like it if I talk to boys…" You told her that her you were a man, not a boy, and since you worked there you could talk to her whenever she wanted to if she needed anything. "You mean it?" You told her absolutely while giving her what was likely the dumbest and goofiest grin you could manage. The girl only stared at you for a moment, but then she started holding back laughter. Looked like your little plan worked after all.
         "You are so silly mister," the girl said, trying to cover her giggles. "Okay then, you can be my new friend." She gave you a polite bow and you gave one in kind before asking her what her name was. "Oh, well, my name is Li Yang. My mother says it means 'Beautiful Willow'. What is your name mister?" You were about to tell her that until the two of you were interrupted by Aimée's sudden presence.
         "Hi daddy—I mean, "Uncle"! What are you doing?" You told her that you were making friends with one of the other students here, about to introduce Li to her until you noticed her shrinking away. Aimée took notice of her and her eyes lit up like brilliant gemstones. "Oh wow, you are so pretty! What's your name?" This only made Li retreat further and you lightly reprimanded Aimée for startling the shy girl. Aimée quickly apologized before taking a seat on the girl's other side. "Sorry for scaring you."
         "Oh, no, it's not problem, really." You introduced Li to Aimée and told her that she didn't have any other friends besides yourself, trying to get Aimée into the swing of befriending the other girl.
         "I'd love to be your friend! You can be my friend too!"
         "Really?"
         "Yup! We can be best friends!"
         "Oh, wow, best friends…" Li looked off to the side blushing furiously as if that was too much for her, though her mouth tugging upwards from behind her hands proved otherwise. She turned to face Aimée with the warmest smile and gently took the other girl's hands into her own. "Y-Yes…! I would love to be friends with you!"
         "Yay! We gonna be besties forever, I just know it!" The two girls giggled among themselves and you felt proud of yourself for taking the time out to help a young girl make friends. Just as you were about to slip away you eyed a group of girls making their way over to you three, all of them dressed in dark colors, and the looks on their faces indicated that this was not a friendly meeting.
         "Look girls, the fairy girl actually made a friend! Isn't that just cute?" the lead girl said while the other five or so snickered to themselves.
         "U-Um, h-hello…" Li replied, making no effort to look away—out of fear, you thought, of angering the other girls.
         "Aw, look, she even brought some of her lunch to share with us. Don't mind if we do." Just as the lead girl was about to grab some of Li's lunch, Aimée stood up and blocked her.
         "Hey, she didn't say you could have some!" Aimée said, causing the other girls to grimace at her.
         "Hey, butt out of this princess. I didn't hear her say 'no' did I?"
         "It's note nice to take some else's food without asking permission!"
         "So, what? I have to ask for YOUR permission like it's YOUR food. Puh-lease, now outta the way pinky." The lead girl just shoved past Aimée and flashed a mean grin. "I'm sorry fairy girl, as I was saying, it is so nice of you to share your lunch with us. You don't mind…do you?"
         "I…well…" You could not believe what you were seeing; by now a crowd of other students, young and old alike, had gathered around you all yet no one did anything about it; if one's peers weren't about to take action, then it was time for the adults to step in and put their foot down.
11111.title: Tell Her That You're A Relative

choices: Meet Up With Angela In Secrecy (Reserved)
111111.content:
You were not about to let these bratty girls (even if they look like they're your kid's age) push her and her new friend around, and being the adult you had to set an example for the other students to follow. You stood up from your seat and reprimanded the lead girl from bullying Aimée and Li, warning that if they kept this up you'd report their actions straight to the principal and then their parents would be notified immediately. While the other five girls looked worried the lead girl never faltered, instead smirking at you.
         "Aw, he thinks I'm gonna get in trouble," she said to the other girls.
         "I mean, I don't want to get in trouble with my dad…" one of the girls said.
         "Oh don't be such a candy-butt. My dad's chief of the police force, and my mom's helping pay for this school; if they think I'm being treated bad in any way this whole dump's getting torn down." It was bad enough that the police were after you about a case you had nothing to do with, but knowing that this girl's father was the very same man leading the case nearly made you back down from scolding her further; letting her push around the other students was unacceptable, however, and even with the threat of this reaching the chief policeman you continued on telling the girl that she was not getting off scott free for getting physical with your "niece".
         "Oh, so your her 'uncle' now? Weren't you just her 'daddy' a few seconds ago? All I have to do is tell my daddy that you were looking at me funny and you'd be locked away for life, and then your little girl's gonna have to go back home to her real daddy." How the girl somehow knew all about that you didn't know, and quite frankly you didn't care, and you were about to warn her once again until she threw the mother of punches right at your testicles, forcing you on your knees to the ground to a chorus of all the other girls gasping. The punch was no joke; it hurt like a grown man decking you, not a middle -schooler. Right before you could get back up, the girl was already kneeling at your level, moving her head right up to yours.
         "I wouldn't be threatening the young daughter of an accomplished police chief and a lawyer—both of whom are very rich I must add—if I were in your position," the girl threatened. You saw the girl pulling out her iPhone and with a few finger flicks here and there showed you something that shook you; there was a recording of you entering the girl's restroom and running into Aimée just as she was relieving herself, with you standing there until the girl took notice of you. You recognized this as having happened yesterday when you met Aimée, and you wondered how this girl could have gotten that footage of you when you were positive that no one else was around yesterday. "I'm pretty sure this little clip outta prove that you're a dirty creep perving on little girls in the bathroom…" You began wondering if this girl was the same person who submitted the fudged footage the principal showed you yesterday, and that might have explained why the police would not hand the footage over or reveal the identity of the witness; if this was some sort of conspiracy that the police chief himself was in on then you wondered how you could fight against the case laid against you. "Now, if you don't want me turning this video in to my daddy, meet me up in the bathrooms tonight. I want you to do something for m—"
         "Alright, that's enough mess out of you!" It was at that moment that the girl found herself snatched away from you
by one of the security guards. "Assaulting one of our employees here and threatening to have this school shut down! Not happening on my watch!"
         "Ack! Let me go you—"
         "I'm hauling your sorry butt right to the principal!" Despite the girl's protests the security guard made no effort to slow down or loosen her grip despite the pickle she'd be getting herself into, though you appreciated that she came to your rescue when she did.
         "And as for the rest of you troublemakers," the second security guard began, "we're letting you off with a warning this time since you didn't actually do anything, but the next time you stir up trouble you can expect phone calls straight to your parents. Understood?" The remaining five bullies gave out squeaky "yes ma'am" replies before bailing the scene. "Alright girls, that's enough staring! We've got the situation under control; you can go back to whatever you were doing." With that the crowd slowly dispersed as the girls all eventually fell back into their routines for the day. Then the security guard knelt down to you and hoisted you up; she was surprisingly strong for her build and size. "Hey, you alright? That girl didn't permanently damage anything down there did she?" You managed to laugh through the pain at the jape and assured her that your testicles were—though sore—still intact.
         "Sorry about that, those girls are your typical troublemakers. The one that hit you is Angela Viktorov, the spoiled rich brat of the police chief and his lawyer wife who invested into this school. She's been nothing but trouble since day one, her and her friends, but we're treading on thin ice since her mother only invested in this school so long as her daughter attended and her father hates our guts, and we were in a tight spot because of our girls-only tradition. Because they both pamper her like she's queen, if they think anything funny is going on with their daughter, they'll both have us all arrested and have this school closed down permanently." So the girl was using her parents' influence to do whatever she wanted with little fear of getting in trouble, but the worst part was with how she now had more leverage against you with the footage she captured of you. Speaking of which, the security guard had knelt down and picked up said iPhone, and you were hoping that she wouldn't turn it on and see the video. "In any case, the girl's getting her phone confiscated for the time being to teach her a little lesson. I doubt she'll be recording punching grown-ups in their privates for a while. You laughed weakly and nervously; it seemed like the security guard hadn't caught on to what was really going on and that was good for you, though you still shuddered at what the girl said to you before being hauled off. She wanted you to meet her in the bathrooms at night, when the school was closed down? There was definitely something strange about that girl Angela…
         "Anyways, good job setting an example for the other girls. Hopefully they'll stand up to bullies more often." You smiled at the woman and took the compliment, and with that she left you be with Aimée and Li. Speaking of, the two girls spoke up once you were sitting back on the table you were at.
         "I'm…I'm so sorry mister…" Li apologized. "I was just…scared of what those girls would do to me if I said no, so I usually let them do whatever they wanted. I didn't want you to get hurt being my friend…" You told Li that it was all fine; friends stood up for each other and had their backs. You'd happily—maybe not that happily—take another punch to the nuts as long as it meant getting the mean girls to leave Li and Aimée alone.
         "Uncle's so brave isn't he?" Aimée said.
         "He really is…" Eventually recess came to an end, and all the girls went back to class, with Aimée and Li bidding you farewell for the day. This left you to your work once more, and when you made it inside the building you were stopped by the principal.
         "Hello once again," she said. "Returned from your extended break with our students I presume?" Then you just remembered that you went over your actual break time, apologizing to the woman. "No need for apologies. By the way, I had just finished speaking with Angela Viktorov and we decided that we are confiscating her iPhone from her for the day as punishment; one of the security guards told me she had planned to record you after assaulting your, erm, testicles, thus the punishment. Her parents have already been notified and they are not well pleased by the punishment as you can expect." Of course they wouldn't, but there was little to be done about that for now, especially if you wanted to fight the case leveled against you. "In any event, Angela has agreed to be on her best behavior from here on out, although she said the very same the last time she was called to my office. One more incident like this and she will be suspended from the school." If she was suspended then it was very likely her parents would take drastic measures against the school though, and the principal knew this. "I pray that it does not come to that but in the end it is what it is. Now then, I do believe I have a job for you later this evening." You were listening, wondering what the principal had in mind. "When all the staff leaves, I will need you to stay behind and tidy up around the school grounds. Nothing too major, just to make sure that everything is neat and tidy for the morning tomorrow. When you are finished, lock the place up; I will give you a spare set of keys since you are a member of our staff and all staff personal are required to have one." You accepted the keys from the principal and thanked her. "You are most welcome. Now, off I go. I have some paperwork to attend to." She gave you a bow and left you alone in the hallway.
         With the keys the principal handed you, you would certainly be able to meet up with Angela and see what it was she wanted with you. If you were a no-show you feared that the worst could happen, but maybe she was only trying to bait you into a bad situation for you to use against you and the school. To meet up with Angela Viktorov or not to…
111111.title: Tell The Bullies To Leave Li and Aimée Alone

1111111.content:
In the end you decided that it was best that you met up with Angela if she had leverage against you and the school, but you were not looking forward to it. With that you went about your duties for the day, and you hadn't run into Angela or her friends throughout the rest of the day. Soon enough, the end-of-day bell rang, and that meant all the students were free to go home. As you waited near the gate for all the students to go on home you spotted Angela apparently arguing with her parents. Her father looked especially displeased and shut down the argument they were having, ending with the girl sulking and slowly climbing into her parents' car after they briefly bickered between themselves. Looked to be an unhappy home you thought, though your thoughts on them were interrupted by Aimée and her new friend Li running up to you.
         "Hi Uncle!" Aimée greeted. "Ready to go home?" You told her that you had some business to attend to, though thankfully you had arranged for one of your coworkers to drive Aimée to your house and stay with her until you got back at least.
         "Me and Aimée had so much fun today." Li said. "Mother will be so happy to know I have a new friend!"
         "Aw, thanks for being my friend too! Hey, maybe we can have a sleepover party soon! Wouldn't that be loads of fun?"
         "Oh, um, Mother doesn't really like me going over other people's houses or inviting company over…"
         "Aww… Well, maybe we can change her mind soon enough!"
         "I would like that very much."
         "So this is where you were hiding," one of the security guards said. "Welp, guess it's time to take you two girls home eh?"
         "Oh, um, thank you miss…" Li said.
         "Don't worry about it, I'm just doing my job. I'll go and take Li here home and then I'll be back for you Aimée. Think you can wait that long?"
         "I can wait," Aimée said.
         "Alright then, see you in a little bit."
         "Bye Li!"
         "Bye Aimée." With that the security guard escorted Li to her car and waited until the girl was buckled in properly before driving off the site. Soon the number of students passing through dwindled until it was just you and Aimée left at the gate.
         "So, Daddy, what did Angela want to meet with you in the restrooms for?" Aimée suddenly asked, her voice taking on an uncharacteristic edge to it. Her serious tone had caught you off guard and you didn't answer her. "Was it because of the video she had on her phone?" So Aimée had heard Angela whispering to you earlier; the girl was just full of surprises. "The principal saw the video and tried deleting it, but because Angela had it on some…'online storage' the principal said…she couldn't really get rid of it, so she left it on Angela's phone in case she checked her phone and found it gone. She didn't want to get in trouble for messing with Angela's phone in case Angela's parents got involved." The principal having seen the video was the last thing you wanted to hear, but her trying to delete it was what caught your attention, yet despite this she didn't mention a word of it to you—likely to cover up the real reason she took the girl's phone. "I think you should see what Angela wants; she'll find some way into the school for sure and I don't trust her not to do anything really bad, so I made you something in art class today with Li's help." Aimée pulled something out from her dress; a little clay angel with a halo and wings on a necklace of beads—perfectly crafted and beautifully colored you noted
         "It's a good luck charm just in case Angela tries to hurt you. Just wear it around your neck like this…" Aimée put the necklace around your neck, "and voila! It looks really nice on you Daddy!" You thanked the girl and ruffled her head, earning a fit of giggles from the girl.
         "Ah, Aimée, there you are," the principal said coming from the gates. "I just spoke with Gloria on the phone and apparently she's been caught in a bad bout of traffic. She's not going to make it back in time to get you home by the time it gets dark."
         "Aw, really? I just hope Li gets home safe."
         "She will sweetie. In any event, I've elected to take you home myself for her, so she need only take Li home."
         "Really? You'd do that?"
         "Of course."
         "Yay! Thank you so much!"
         "Any time sweetie. Oh, and before I forget, here's your staff badge." The principal handed you a badge made in the shape of St. Adelaide's K-12 Academy. In case you hadn't noticed it, all staff members are required to wear it. My apologies for it having slipped my mind yesterday, but after today's incident with Angela I feel you should wear it so students will know by your badge that misconduct towards you will not be tolerated." You accepted the badge from the principal and pinned it to your shirt. "Splendid, now doesn't that look nice on you? By the way, this badge comes with a special button on it; for students who are particularly rowdy, especially between the older ones from ninth through twelfth grade, you just press it and our security will come right along. Don't hesitate to press it whenever—and I do mean whenever you need help dealing with some of our students. We do try to make St Adelaide's a haven for young girls and women to learn, but not all of our students will play nice." You thanked the principal for the badge and promised her that you would do your best in maintaining safety in the school. "You are most welcome. Now, if I may, I must be going to take young Aimée home for you. Do try not to stay too long looking after the school alright?"
         "Bye Daddy—I mean 'Uncle'!" Waving goodbye to the principal and Aimée, you disappeared behind the gates and locked them from the inside. Despite thinking that it should keep the likes of Angela out of the school, Aimée's words from earlier made you wonder just how the girl would get in the school. Getting straight to work, you went around the school grounds mostly looking for any trash that the students or staff members left behind and throwing it away. The school building was far less messy than the playgrounds and sports fields. With how big the school was you knew it would take you until dark if there was anything to thoroughly clean. Saving the restrooms for last, a part of you dreaded somehow finding Angela in one of them (or any student really), so this time you knocked on the door and called out for anyone still inside. Not hearing anyone, you announced that you were coming in to clean the restrooms, and opening the door you found the restrooms to be empty to your fortune. Unfortunately the restrooms were quite messy, leaving you a lot to clean up after.
         It took some time, but you finally cleared out all the restrooms of any filth left behind in them, and by the time you were completely done with the school nightfall had come. There was no sign of Angela anywhere in the restrooms, so maybe she gave up on that and stayed home. Now you were free to go home back to Aimée and enjoy the rest of your evening, so you made your way to the school gates and started unlocking them, at least until you heard someone behind you.
         "Going somewhere, mister janitor…?" It just wasn't so—you couldn't believe that it was actually happening, but when you turned your head around you were met by the sight of Angela Viktorov, and she wasn't alone either. The same five friends of hers from earlier were with her too, and all of them had mischievous grins plastered on their faces. "I do remember making it clear where we were going to meet up didn't I?" How she managed to get into the school grounds was beyond you, and you knew straight away that Angela and her friends were no ordinary middleschoolers. Thinking quick, without turning yourself around just yet you pressed the special button on your badge on the hope that the principal really did mean 'whenever you needed help with the students' and you were relieved that it made no sound or light. Now turning to face the girls, you reluctantly put your keys away and asked Angela what she was after.
         "You, of course," the girl replied. "I want to talk to you about a few things. Now, if you'll be so kind as to come with us…" You complied, trailing after the girls as they led you straight back to the restrooms all the way in the back of the school that you had finished cleaning. "After you," Angela said, gesturing you inside the restroom. You went inside, somewhat expecting the girls to trap you inside, but instead they each followed you in, with the last girl locking the door behind her with the lock on the doorknob. You eyed the girls suspiciously, wondering why they all stared at you like a juicy slab of meat.
         "I like you," Angela said, sauntering up to you and circling you. "Not everyone actually stands up to me unless it's the dumb school staff." You merely replied that you had to be the grown-up and diffuse the situation. The more you thought about it, the more (or less) everything started to make sense about your current situation; you went from a lowly custodian to…a lowly custodian who found himself in the company of several angels—also attracting the attention of a fallen angel and her witches. This was the sort of outlandish fantasy you could have never dreamed of even in your wildest imagination, and you honestly hoped that things didn't get even crazier than how they were now. Despite effectively getting thrown into a war between supernatural beings because of becoming the slave of the very fallen angel waging that war, you couldn't find it in you to be too freaked out; it very likely would have been worse without the divine intervention of your new guardian angel Amore. Her compassion for you was as clear as day and the thought of someone caring about you so sincerely made you smile. It had been a long time since someone had actually shown you any unconditional love…
         Thoughts of you and Amore spending time with each other flooded your mind as you relaxed further into the tub—things like amusement parks, eating out at fancy restaurants, trips around the world, making love under the sheets, growing old togeth—
         …
         ……
         ………
         …Right then and there you just remembered that Amore was a very old, long-lived angel. In her own words, she walked the Earth before the first signs of life had shown themselves. She had likely done everything there was to do and then some—including the possibility of having multiple partners in the past. You immediately smacked yourself (lightly) for that thought; you didn't want to start feeling bad thoughts over Amore sharing her bed with others. She was an angel—she likely had lots of lonely nights to herself and wanted to spend those nights in others' warmth. Still, you couldn't help but feel that you wouldn't be the most special to her even now; chalk it up to typical guy feelings wanting their girl to love them more than any other dude, but that was the general feeling creeping into your mind. Absentmindedly, you started to hope that if you didn't somehow end up immortal by the end of all of this, that you'd at least manage to make some sort of lasting impact with Amore.
         You heard gentle knocks on your bathroom door, snapping you out of your thoughts to awkwardly allow Amore to come in. The door fell open to reveal Amore in the same dress she wore earlier, casually walking her way over to take a seat on the closed toilet lid next to you.
         "How are you?" she asked. "Do you feel any more refreshed now that you are bathing?" You nodded in that you felt a little better than earlier, though the exhaustion from last night and today's encounter with Angela hadn't completely left you yet. "Ah, it is good that you are recovering. Here, I have some bath bombs that should soothe your sore body." From the way she spoke she sounded like she was your live-in nurse than the daughter you had just adopted yesterday. You graciously accepted the bath bombs and dropped them in the water, watching them fizz. "Your bed has been taken care of, so when you are finished here you will be able to sleep in it soundly and comfortably." You thanked Amore for doing you a huge favor and she replied in kind. You started to feel the soothing effect of the bath bombs and wondered aloud if you could just lay up in the tub all night, earning a giggle from the angel. "I would not advise it. Getting too comfortable in the bathtub could lead to deadly results, but rest assured as long as I am here it will never come to that." You laughed at how blunt Amore warned you not to get yourself killed in your own tub, and for some strange reason the mention of death got you thinking back to how long-lived Amore was. You wondered if Amore had boyfriends and such only to lose them to having their times tragically cut short.
         "What is troubling you?" Amore asked. "Your eyes are cross with unpleasant thoughts. Anything I can help with with?" You looked into the angel's eyes and debated whether or not you should bother her with something that was probably trivial to her only because you couldn't rest easy without knowing more. Not wanting to lie to her, you hesitantly let her in on the things that were bothering you: your short lifespan compared to hers and the likelihood of her having had previous partners who are all probably deceased by now. You wondered if there was anything you could actually do to bring her any joy in life that she hadn't already experienced—if you would be a good partner for her. You tried not to, but you found yourself recounting memories of the time you spent with your ex-girlfriend and the tragic but inevitable break-up you two had, resulting in your disowning by your father and being cast out to live on your own. You never meant to tell Amore so much so soon, but you couldn't stop yourself somehow as if talking to Amore got you to open up about yourself more than you ever did with anyone else. Your love clearly wasn't enough for someone like your ex-girlfriend so how would it be enough for an angel of all things?
         You looked into Amore's eyes again and you didn't find any sort of patronizing pity, disappointment, or amusement like what others in your family had for you when you were being kicked out; she looked at you with gentle understanding, completely impartial almost, and then she leaned forward with her hands on the edge of the tub.
         "You never need worry about whether your love will be enough for me," she said. "I have experienced many things, yes, and I have had my share of partners in the past as well, but what truly matters is whether your heart is in it. I have often found myself disappointed by purely carnal lovers, both man and woman, but for those who were truly willing to spend their lives with me out of true love…I will forever cherish those precious times. I have been with those who feel the same way you do—those who feared that I was 'too good for them' or that they didn't love me the way I loved them. I will say to you what I have said to them…" Amore knelt on the floot and closed the distance with her hands on your face, one cupping each cheek as she let the light of her eyes flow into yours. Instead of saying anything, she instead leaned in for a kiss, and from that kiss alone you could understand everything she would have said, all contained in that kiss, without having to say a single word. You melted in the feeling flowing between you two, that you finally found someone you could openly love from the heart, and you returned that pure kiss with one of your own. You two sat for a spell, pulling your lips away to smile at each other. You took Amore in your gaze; what was she if not an angel of love—if not love itself. You wished that this moment would last forever…and then you nearly go under from slipping on your own ass in the tub. This understandably shocked the two of you, but all you could do afterward was laugh from the unintentional moment killer. Maybe you had been in the bath for too long; besides that you were sure that you were pruning by then so now was a better time to get out before you shriveled up too much. I would rectify this but I fear that we would not get much rest if I did. If it helps, I will not look and stare." You almost felt like a little kid but it couldn't be helped. Carefully, you extracted yourself from the bathtub and grabbed for a towel to dry yourself off before slipping your boxers on. Now dressed for rest, you led Amore to your bedroom, and though you briefly remembered that you hadn't washed it, the knowledge that Amore took care of it for you pressed you onward. True to her word your bed had been immaculately tended to with the sheets and blankets fresh as early snow. You were almost tempted to jump on it like a kid just to feel its softness, but you restrained yourself in Amore's presence to be grateful for the work she did with your bed…only for Amore to dive right into it nearly screaming "wheee" in the process. You eventually came to tell yourself "oh what the hell" before following suit, causing Amore to fly into the air from your impact. She landed back down laughing along with you, taking some time to calm down.
         "I am so very glad that you are someone I can share in my fun with," Amore said. "It makes the time we spend together all the lovelier, though I must admit that even I can fear for our future together. The future is unknowable, even to us angels, so death could claim you at any untimely moment. But…even then, I will not let that hold my love back; I will keep my eyes ahead on the path of this uncertain future and brave it with you—hope strong in my heart." Amore took your hand into hers as the two of you lay under the covers, and you could feel the gentle warmth from it. "Goodnight, my love… May we walk forward hand-in-hand to meet this future, and may we know love and happiness, now and forever…" You bid her the same for night and let your eyes be closed, waiting for when sleep would find you and awaiting the next morning light—no longer worried for the world of tomorrow, but now welcoming the dawn of a new life from this day forth…

Strange as that is, you welcomed the warm reception from the staff proud of you to have fulfilled the prerequisites (which was no small feat mind you). In time, the student and staff body alike come to adore you as their precious janitor, and you've earned a bit of a celebrity-like status. However, disquieting rumors from the neighboring community seem to be trying to get you landed in prison or worse, though neither student nor staff are having any of it and adamantly defend you from the others. One day, though, upon a chance encounter with a young student at a time and place you weren't meant to meet, you'll find that the institution is far more than what meets the eye…

Luckily some of these females are nothing but kind, though there are others who aren't so sugary sweet. While there will be a sort of "default" story involved that branches off from the first chapter, ultimately it's up to the readers to decide what path they wish to follow themselves.

Below are the general set of rules and, fair warning, they may be strict:
         If you start a route, be sure to leave at least one empty slot for another person to start their own routes—mark your routes that you do not wish to be disturbed as "reserved", especially if you can add up to three or more extra routes, and respect others' "reserved" routes by not hijacking them—this will include myself as well regarding the "default" canon. However, if you have a "reserved" route and it has not been worked on for at least a month or two (or I suspect that you have been inactive for that long period), I will free it up to the best of my ability for others to use it. Likewise, if I have not acted on a "reserved" route in the specified time feel free to use it yourself. As an addendum to this, I will remove the "reserved" mark on chapters I have completed and hope that others will do the same with chapters they have finished as well.
         If you are going to end a route, please do so on a route you "reserved" for yourself and not on others were there is no such "reservation".
         While I will not disallow any sort of sexual fetish, I will not tolerate out-and-out rape made out to be "enjoyable" for the victim in any fashion; if I see such writing it will be trashed immediately. Rape fantasy thus should be written very carefully to make sure that it is entirely consensual on both party's ends.
         While not a "rule" per se, please take care to write with proper grammar, though I understand that sometimes it can be difficult if you do not speak English or some other language you're writing in as your first language.
         Another thing is that while this isn't an outright rule it should still be considered; I enjoy stories with heart put into them; even if it is just about the janitor "conquering" all the females at the school I would like to encourage all of you to put some care into it to make it enjoyable to read. Short entries will be allowed on a case-by-case basis; chapters should be about four to five sentences long (which themselves should be about four to five words long).
         Since this is an interactive story from the reader's perspective it would be expected that most entries are written from the reader's point of view and what actions they will take next; the janitor will be male by default but changing his sex and/or gender is still perfectly acceptable for those who do not identify with a male/cisgendered protagonist.

The rules may change and be adjusted to entries added here and there but that should be about it for now. I bid you all a well writing experience. I will add gift points for satisfactory entries for as long as I have gift points.
